entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
entry.content: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

entry.title: ayanchyaziz123/Advanced-Meeting-Intelligence-frontend: NGI Meeting Transcription & Summarization Platform is a lightweight AI-powered SaaS tool designed for private associations to enhance meeting productivity by transcribing and summarizing recordings (Zoom, Teams, in-person audio), generating structured notes with agenda items, decisions, and action items, supporting multiple languages and platforms.
entry.content: NGI Meeting Transcription & Summarization Platform is a lightweight AI-powered SaaS tool designed for private associations to enhance meeting productivity by transcribing and summarizing recordings (Zoom, Teams, in-person audio), generating structured notes with agenda items, decisions, and action items, supporting multiple languages and platforms.
